While some states maintain essentially this definition of rape, most have broadened its scope especially in terms of the sex of the persons and the nature of the acts involved.
Marital status is usually irrelevant.
Moreover, the crime is codified under various names, including first degree sexual assault sexual battery unlawful sexual intercourse and first degree sexual abuse.
